titleStmt.title: A sermon of the pestilence Preached at Chiswick, 1603. By the right reverend father in God, Lancelot Andrewes, late L. Bishop of Winchester.
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Lancelot, 1555-1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Badger, and are to be sold in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, neere the Church-doore,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached in the time of pestilence.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: Saint Dunstans Church-yard, neere the Church-doore
